## Packages 

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Seed

```{r}
set.seed(84735)
```

## Nombre de simulations

```{r}
n = 10000
```

## Prior

```{r}
ggplot() +
  stat_function(fun = ~dbeta(.x, 9, 11))
```

## Simulation

```{r}
x = data.frame(pi = rbeta(n, 9, 11)) |> 
  mutate(y = rbinom(n, size = 50, prob = pi))
```

## Plot

```{r}
ggplot(x) +
  geom_point(aes(x = pi, y = y, color = (y == 30)))
```

## Posterior data

```{r}
posterior = x |> 
  filter(y == 30)
```

## Plot posterior

```{r}
#| code-fold: true
ggplot(posterior) +
  geom_density(aes(x = pi))
```

## Compare

```{r}
#| code-fold: true
ggplot(posterior) +
  geom_density(aes(x = pi)) + 
  stat_function(fun = ~dbeta(.x, 39, 31), color = "red")
```

## Summarise

```{r}
posterior |> 
  summarise(mean(pi), sqrt(var(pi)))
```

## Compare

```{r}
mean = 39 / (39 + 31)
sd = sqrt((39 * 31) / ((39 + 31) ^ 2 * (39 + 31 + 1)))
mean
sd
```
